gr.uop

Class Square

  • java.lang.Object
    • gr.uop.Square
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Square>

    public class Square
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Square>
    represents one square (landscape) in a domino tile each domino tile has two squares (landscapes) a spacial landscape of type castle is used for castle square on board

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Square.LandscapeType
      enum for square landscape type FARM, FIELD, FOREST, LAKE, LAND, ROCKS, CASTLE,UNKNWON
      static class  Square.SquareColor
      to be discarded , enum for square colors according to landscape, YELLOW, GREEN, GRAY, BLUE, LIGHTGRAY, BROWN, RED, WHITE, BLACK
      static class  Square.SquareType
      enum for square types LANDSCAPE, CASTLE, EMPTY

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      ImageView castleImageView 
      int clientnumber
      the client number that reserved this square-domino initial value -1 = no client
      int colonBoard
      the column of board (GridPane - Kingdom) this square placed initial value -1 = not in board
      Color color
      square color in Hex (javafx Color) defined by its main type this is for grouping same landscape squares and for drawing background wihtout pictures
      boolean countedInScore
      flag is counted when calculating score
      int crowns
      number of crowns on this square
      Square.SquareColor enumSquareColor
      to be discarded, square colors according to landscape, YELLOW, GREEN, GRAY, BLUE, LIGHTGRAY, BROWN, RED, WHITE, BLACK
      int hashc 
      int kingNumber
      the king number that reserved this square-domino initial value -1 = no king
      ImageView landscapeImageView 
      Square.LandscapeType landscapeType
      the type of the landscape FARM, FIELD, FOREST, LAKE, LAND, ROCKS, CASTLE,UNKNWON
      java.lang.String playercolor
      the player/king color that reserved this square-domino initial value 'none' = no player
      int playernumber
      the player number that reserved this square-domino initial value -1 = no player
      int relativeCol 
      int relativeRow 
      int rowonBoard
      the row of board (GridPane - Kingdom) this square placed initial value -1 = not in board
      java.lang.String Square
      the square type, eg.
      Square.SquareType squareType
      the type of square LANDSCAPE, CASTLE, EMPTY
      java.lang.String strColor
      square color string defined by its main type this is for grouping same landscape squares and for drawing background wihtout pictures eg.
      Tile theTile
      the tile (domino) object this square belongs
      int tileAa 
      int whichSqr
      the square number in domino 1=left , 2=right as in domins.txt

        number of crowns on this square

      • color

        public Color color
        square color in Hex (javafx Color) defined by its main type this is for grouping same landscape squares and for drawing background wihtout pictures

      • strColor

        public java.lang.String strColor
        square color string defined by its main type this is for grouping same landscape squares and for drawing background wihtout pictures eg. yellow

      • kingNumber

        public int kingNumber
        the king number that reserved this square-domino initial value -1 = no king

        the player number that reserved this square-domino initial value -1 = no player

    • Constructor Detail

      • Square

        public Square(int aa,
              int whichsqr,
              int crowns,
              java.lang.String sqr,
              int kingn,
              int plrn,
              int cltn,
              java.lang.String plrclr,
              Tile thetile)
        basic constructor
        Parameters:
        aa - Tile number (domino number)
        whichsqr - the square number in domino 1=left , 2=right as in domins.txt
        crowns - number of crowns on this square
        sqr - the square type, eg. farm1c
        kingn - the king number that reserved this square-domino
        plrn - the player number that reserved this square-domino
        cltn - the client number that reserved this square-domino
        plrclr - the player/king color that reserved this square-domino
        thetile - the tile (domino) object this square belongs

      • Square

        public Square(Square sq,
              int whichsqr)
        constructor, creates a new square from existing one, used for copying one square to a new one
        Parameters:
        sq - the Square from which the new Square will be copied
        whichsqr - the square number in domino (tile)
